title: Wisconsin Writer Examines El Salvador, Where Third Of Population Has Moved to U.S.
teaser: El Salvador is a long way from the University of Wisconsin-Whiterwater. But writer and social work professor Jim Winship has made the trip many times.
contentencoded:
